title: Automatic Software Private Limited
text:
Pune Freshers Direct Walk-Ins:

Automatic Software Private Limited Jr. Application Developers (Walkin) 
Candidate must have good communication and presentation skills
Strong initiative and a proactive mind-set
Highly adaptable and a fast learner
Utilize established development tools, guidelines and conventions
Windows Development, Web Development, SQL Server, HTML,
CSS, Java Script, C#/ VB .Net, Angular JS and MVC, Bootstrap
Develop and support .Net Web Applications. 
Client facing, people management and leadership skills
Ability to work in global team
Should be Flexible for Travel
Walk-in Date/ Time:
12th - 29th June , 10 AM onwards
Interview Venue:
Automatic Software Private Limited
Kapil Upavan Plaza, Office No. 301, 3rd Floor, 
Chaitraban Bibwewadi Pune - 411 037. 
Contact Number:9130006138
Landmark : Near SBI Colony
